Smart Hair Dryer: A hair dryer that can analyze the texture and type of hair and adjust the settings accordingly for the best drying results.
Hair Dryer with Built-In Styling Tools: A hair dryer that comes with built-in styling tools such as a flat iron, curling iron, or texturizing brush.
Hair Dryer with Heatless Drying Function: A hair dryer that also has a heatless drying function, allowing you to dry your hair using only cold air.
Hair Dryer with Negative Ion Technology: A hair dryer that uses negative ion technology to reduce frizz and improve shine.
Hair Dryer with Built-In Hair Brush: A hair dryer that comes with a built-in hair brush, allowing you to detangle and style your hair as you dry it.
